name: Ctrl CV
description: Welcome to the world of Ctrl CV, a find-the-image platformer puzzle game. You are surrounded by countless clones of yourself, and your goal is to find the source of these doppelgangers. Try not to lose yourself in the midst of "yourselves".
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: Intel Pentium 4 Series Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: CPU-integrated or on-board graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card Additional Notes: DirectPlay required
